text: Isabelle Pieman (born 28 September 1983) is a Belgian former competitive figure skater. She won five senior international medals and three Belgian national titles (2007, 2009, 2012). At the 2009 Nebelhorn Trophy, Pieman qualified a spot for Belgium in the ladies' singles event at the 2010 Winter Olympics in Vancouver, where she placed 25th. She qualified to the free skate at the 2012 European Championships in Sheffield. == Programs == {|class=wikitable style=text-align:center ! Season ! Short program !
